divs: Sighting DetailsOkay, I was going to school with my mother, and I saw what appeared to be a round-topped, teardrop-traingle craft, it was red all over, flew aross the road and stopped. When it stopped, it jerked a little. In fact, when I saw it come in and out of view, IT PHASED. I wasn't scared when I saw it, or after I saw it.
Summary: It looked like it was red, red all over, with what appeared to be a black front and an up-side down V wing in back.
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Virginia Beach
There were no other sightings in Virginia Beach on or around December 18th 2008
